name: Red's Feast
description:
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Red's Feast is a 2D Survival Game and my First Game. The Objective of the Game can be found Below:

Red (the ordinary red block) was out for a picnic in the air, when in it's surroundings a Virus (the green bacteria) was there! How far/long will you be able to enjoy your picnic without getting Infected? Eat as much a variety (different) of food as possible to Earn Points and Increase your High Score!

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Main Control: W=up / S=down / A=left / D=right

An Optional Control: "All Arrow Keys."

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Credits
